tooltip.xyz_scythes.nether_right: Right click to shoot a fireball
tooltip.xyz_scythes.nether_shift: Shift+Right click to shoot a bigger fireball
tooltip.xyz_scythes.sculk_right: Right click to shoot a sonic blast
tooltip.xyz_scythes.sculk_shift: Shift+Right click to detect all entities around you
tooltip.xyz_scythes.ender_right: Right click to throw an ender pearl
tooltip.xyz_scythes.ender_shift: Shift+Right click to open teleport menu
tooltip.xyz_scythes.blood_right: Right click to shoot blood projectile (Transfers effects)
tooltip.xyz_scythes.blood_shift: Shift+Right click to pull entities towards you
